trans-unit.source: Represents a callout annotation.
trans-unit.target: 表示标注批注。

trans-unit.source: A callout annotation is the only annotation that draws a connection between the annotation position and the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: 标注批注是批注位置和定位点之间绘制一个连接的唯一注释。

trans-unit.source: This class can also display text and automatically calculate its required size.
trans-unit.target: 此类可以还显示文本，并自动计算其所需的大小。

trans-unit.source: Different callout styles are supported.
trans-unit.target: 支持不同的标注样式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the annotation position alignment to the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置批注相对于定位点的位置对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> value that represents the alignment of the annotation to the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> 值，该值表示批注相对于定位点的对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the offset that the X-position of the annotation has from the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置批注的 X 位置相对于定位点的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="double" /> value that represents the offset of the annotation's X-position from the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="double" /> 值，该值表示批注的 X 位置相对于定位点的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation> must be anchored using either the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorX%2A> property, and its <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.X%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation>必须使用锚定<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorX%2A>属性，并将其<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.X%2A>属性必须设置为<xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the offset that the Y-position of the annotation has from the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置批注的 Y 位置相对于定位点的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="double" /> value that represents the offset of the annotation's Y-position from the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="double" /> 值，该值表示批注的 Y 位置相对于定位点的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation> must be anchored using either the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorY%2A> property, and its <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Y%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation>必须使用锚定<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorY%2A>属性，并将其<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Y%2A>属性必须设置为<xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the annotation type name.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置批注类型名称。

trans-unit.source: For internal use, should not be used.
trans-unit.target: 仅供内部使用，不得另作他用。

trans-unit.source: The annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 批注类型。

trans-unit.source: For internal use, should not be used.
trans-unit.target: 仅供内部使用，不得另作他用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置批注的背景色。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the annotation background gradient style.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置批注的背景渐变样式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle" /> enumeration value used to draw the annotation background.
trans-unit.target: 用于绘制批注背景的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle" /> 枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Two colors are used to draw the gradient, and are set with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 两种颜色用于绘制渐变，并设置与<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackColor%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background hatch style of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置批注的背景阴影样式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle" /> value used to draw the annotation background.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle" /> 值，该值用于绘制批注背景。

trans-unit.source: Two colors are used to draw the hatching, and are set with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 两种颜色用于绘制阴影，并设置与<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackColor%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the secondary color for the annotation background.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置批注背景的辅助颜色。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> enumeration value used in conjunction with a primary color to draw the annotation background with hatching or gradient fill.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 枚举值，该值用于与基本色一起绘制带阴影或渐变填充的批注背景。

trans-unit.source: This color is used with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackColor%2A> property when the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackHatchStyle%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackGradientStyle%2A> properties are used.
trans-unit.target: 此颜色用于<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackColor%2A>属性时<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackHatchStyle%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.BackGradientStyle%2A>使用属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style for a callout line anchor cap.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置标注线条定位点端的样式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnchorCapStyle" /> enumeration value that represents the style to use for a callout line anchor cap.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnchorCapStyle" /> 枚举值，表示要用于标注线条定位点端的样式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.CalloutAnchorCap%2A> property sets the style of the anchor cap for the line that connects the annotation with the anchor point.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.CalloutAnchorCap%2A>属性设置为行与定位点连接的批注定位点端的样式。

trans-unit.source: This property is only applicable when a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutStyle.SimpleLine> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutStyle.Borderline> callout style is used.
trans-unit.target: 此属性才适用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutStyle.SimpleLine>或<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutStyle.Borderline>使用标注样式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the annotation callout style.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置批注的标注样式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutStyle" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutStyle" /> 枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the annotation line color.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置批注的线条颜色。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value used to draw the annotation line.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 值，该值用于绘制批注线。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the annotation line style.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置批注的线条样式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle" /> enumeration value used to draw the annotation line.
trans-unit.target: 用于绘制批注线的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle" /> 枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the line width of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置批注的线条宽度。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="integer" /> value that represents the annotation line width, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="integer" /> 值，该值表示批注的线条宽度（以像素为单位）。
